name: Egg Team
description:
If you are looking a simple game with refreshing graphics, while challenging friends. Join the egg
team. Check your score and ranking among friends and global players in game center leaderboard!


Features:

Leaderboard and achievements
Plenty of unlockables
One touch control
Refreshing graphics
Tricky and addictive

Be careful, this simple taping game may drives you crazy. Try not to get addicted.
